title: Is the Anabelle ghost story real? - Quora

response.answer_text: The cursed doll of Anabelle is real enough and there are numerous claims that the original doll, now preserved at a museum makes strange movements at moments. While the movie was spiced up and its just another creepy pasta, the real legend is surrounded by some gruesome reality and its tragic to the core. So you can probably guess how come a child's spirit possessed an eerie looking doll.

Anabelle … is supposed to be a spirit into a doll .. see when you look into indian culture you can find spirits closed in jars .. in middle east it was like in lamps… some are true … some cant be explained … thats haunting … if u saw the movie the conjuring .. u might have a chance to rethink .. but thats … i also ready that the doll is in a museum now ..
